author: NASS
description:
I used a new colorization technique, restored and created a sound design for this video of Paris in the 1930s, where you can see emblematic landmarks such as the Palais du Trocadéro facing the Eiffel Tower, the lively cafés of Montparnasse, the majestic Notre-Dame, or the Fontaine Médicis hidden in the Luxembourg Gardens, and others.

Video Restoration Process:
✔ FPS boosted to 60 frames per second 
✔ Image resolution boosted up to HD 
✔ Improved video sharpness and brightness 
✔ Colorized only for the ambiance (not historically accurate)
✔added sound design only for the ambiance
✔restoration:(stabilisation,denoise,cleand,deblur) 

Please, be aware that colorization colors are not real and fake, colorization was made only for the ambiance and do not represent real historical data.

B&W Video Source from: United States Holocaust Memorial Museum





Join this channel to benefit from exclusive advantages and also to support us: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC1W8ShdwtfgjRHdbl1Lctcw/j
title: Paris 1930s in Color, A Rare Glimpse Before WWII [60FPS, Remastered] w/ Sound Design Added
